mapper.select: SELECT ir.id, ir.prod_code, ir.prod_name, ir.prod_id, ir.qty, ir.unit_id, ir.lead_time, prd.capacity, bm.category_name, bm.spe_type, bm.model FROM inquiry_record ir left join bas_material bm on ir.prod_id = bm.id left join purchase_request_detail prd on ir.to_record_id = prd.id where ir.inquiry_id = #{id} and ir.del_flag = '0'

select isp.id, isp.is_recommend, isp.supplier_id, isp.record_id, isp.status, isp.inquiry_qty, isp.is_bargin, isp.is_contract, bs.name, sq.id as quote_id, sq.currency, sq.tax_rate, sq.order_price, sq.order_price_tax, sq.order_amount, sq.order_amount_tax, sq.trade_type, sq.fare_amount, sq.brand_name, sq.spe_type from inquiry_supplier isp left join bas_supplier bs on isp.supplier_id = bs.id left join sup_quote sq on isp.record_id = sq.record_id and isp.supplier_id = sq.supp_id where isp.del_flag = '0' and isp.record_id in
#{item}

SELECT ir.prod_name, ir.prod_code, ir.id, iss.inquiry_qty as qty, ir.lead_time, sq.spe_type, sq.brand_name as prod_brand, ir.unit_id, ir.prod_id, bm.model, prd.capacity, ifnull(sb.supp_order_price,sq.order_price_tax) as price_tax, round(ifnull(sb.supp_order_price_tax,sq.order_price_tax) * iss.inquiry_qty,2) as amount_tax, ifnull(sb.supp_order_price,sq.order_price) as price, round(ifnull(sb.supp_order_price,sq.order_price) * iss.inquiry_qty,2) as amount, sq.currency as contract_currency, sq.amount as other_amount, sq.add_tax, sq.customs_tax, sq.tax_rate, sq.id as quote_record_id, ifnull(pbr.budget_price,0) as budget_price FROM inquiry_record ir left join bas_material bm on ir.prod_id = bm.id left join purchase_request_detail prd on ir.to_record_id = prd.id left join purchase_request_main prm on prd.req_id = prm.id left join project_bom_relation pbr on prd.prod_id = pbr.material_id and prm.category_id = pbr.category_id and pbr.del_flag = '0' left join inquiry_supplier iss on ir.id = iss.record_id and iss.is_recommend = '1' LEFT JOIN sup_quote sq ON ir.id = sq.record_id AND iss.supplier_id = sq.supp_id left join ( SELECT sb.* FROM ( SELECT sb.quote_id, MAX( sb.create_time ) AS create_time FROM sup_bargain sb GROUP BY sb.quote_id ) tmp LEFT JOIN sup_bargain sb ON sb.quote_id = sb.quote_id AND sb.create_time = tmp.create_time ) sb on sq.id = sb.quote_id where iss.id = #{id}
